```{r echo=FALSE, comment=NA}
if("RateBP" %in% params$plotlist){
  plot(params$plot1)
  cat("This plot displays side-by-side boxplots of ratings assigned to each proposal.\nThe x-axis displays proposals in numerical order and the y-asix displays ratings from best to worst.")
}


if("RankBP" %in% params$plotlist){
  plot(params$plot2)
  cat("This plot displays stacked barcharts of the ranks assigned to each proposal.\nThe x-axis displays proposals in   numerical order and the y-axis displays counts.\nDifferent rank levels are indicated using colors.")
}


if("Incon" %in% params$plotlist){
  plot(params$plot3)
  cat("This plot displays a histogram of reviewer-level inconsistencies. Here, inconsistency is defined \nas the total number of unique object pairs for which their ordering in a judge's ranking does\nnot match their implied ordering by a judge's ratings. We do not count pairs in which the order\nof objects cannot beinferred based on ratings or rankings (e.g., due to missing data or rating ties).\nA value of 0 indicates a judge whose ratings were internally consistent with his/her ranking.")
}


if("MBQual" %in% params$plotlist){
  plot(params$plot4)
  cat("Description")
}


if("MBRank" %in% params$plotlist){
  plot(params$plot5)
  cat("Description")
}


if("MBMean" %in% params$plotlist){
  plot(params$plot6)
  cat("Description")
}


```
